DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect different method administration emergence period laryngeal mask anesthesia elderly patient undergo transurethral endoscopic operation
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Two Induction Means Emergence After General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: ASA level I II , Aged 65 79 , With duration anesthesia < 90 min . Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , Severe heart disease , Difficult airway Liver kidney dysfunction , Cerebrovascular disease , Bleeding volume > 20 ml .
